com.bit6.sdk

Class Bit6

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bit6.sdk.Bit6

  • public class Bit6
extends java.lang.Object
    Bit6 is for interaction between the Bit6 framework and application

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Bit6 getInstance()
        Returns:
        Singleton instance of Bit6 class.

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
        java.lang.String apikey)
        Configures Bit6 instance, setting all required fields.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        apikey - Bit6 API key
        app - Application class of the application which uses Bit6 SDK
        gcmSenderId - This is the project number you got from the GCM API Console.

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
        java.lang.String apikey,
        int environment)
        Configures Bit6 instance, setting all required fields.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        apikey - Bit6 API key
        app - Application class of the application which uses Bit6 SDK
        gcmSenderId - This is the project number you got from the GCM API Console.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys Bit6 instance, nullifies all members and destroys all connections. Calling init() is required for using Bit6 instance next time.

      • login

        public void login(Address identity,
         java.lang.String password,
         ResultCallback cb)
        Parameters:
        identity - User identity.
        password - User password.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • signup

        public void signup(Address identity,
          java.lang.String password,
          ResultCallback cb)
        Parameters:
        identity - User identity.
        password - User password.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • isUserLoggedIn

        public boolean isUserLoggedIn()
        Checks if user loged in or not.
        Returns:
        true if user Id and token value are saved in preferences, false - otherwise.

      • getOwnIdentity

        public Address getOwnIdentity()
        Loads the identity which was used for logging in.
        Returns:
        user name which was used in order to login into account.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Deletes all saved data in preferences (user id, token, etc...) and from local database(messages).

      • deleteMessage

        public void deleteMessage(java.lang.String messageId,
                 ResultCallback cb)
        Deletes message from local DB and from the server.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The message ID which must be deleted.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • deleteConversation

        public void deleteConversation(Address other,
                      ResultCallback cb)
        Deletes messages from local DB and from the server for this conversation.
        Parameters:
        other - The conversation which must be deleted.
        cb - CallBack object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called in UI thread.

      • getChanges

        public void getChanges()
        Gets messages from server, parses the result and saves in local database.

      • getConversations

        public android.database.Cursor getConversations()
        Retrieves a list of conversations.
        Returns:
        Cursor object which contains messages grouped by chat members user names and ordered by Messages.CREATED + " DESC".

      • getConversation

        public android.database.Cursor getConversation(Address other)
        Retrieves a conversation.
        Parameters:
        other - - the user name of other chat member.
        Returns:
        Cursor object which contains incoming and outgoing messages ordered by Messages.CREATED + " ASC"

      • onForeground

        public void onForeground()

      • onBackground

        public void onBackground()

      • sendTypingNotification

        public void sendTypingNotification(Address to)
        Sends typing notification to the specified destination.
        Parameters:
        to - Destination Address

      • addRtNotificationListener

        public void addRtNotificationListener(RtNotificationListener listener)
        Adds listener to Bit6 instance. The listener is called when new message or notification (typing or message update) arrives.
        Parameters:
        listener - RtNotificationListener

      • removeRtNotificationListener

        public void removeRtNotificationListener(RtNotificationListener listener)
        Removes message listener from Bit6 listeners.
        Parameters:
        listener - RtNotificationListener

      • getDownloadManager

        public com.bit6.sdk.attachment.ThumbDownloadManager getDownloadManager()
        Returns:
        Thumbnail Download manager

      • downloadThumbForMessage

        public void downloadThumbForMessage(java.lang.String id)
        Downloads thumbnail for specified message, saves in file system and saves local path in db if thumbnail was not found in memory cache.
        Parameters:
        id - Message row ID

      • updateThumbLocalPath

        public void updateThumbLocalPath(java.lang.String messageId,
                        java.lang.String path)
        Updates thumbnails local path in messages table
        Parameters:
        messageId - Message row ID
        path - New path

      • getPackageName

        public java.lang.String getPackageName()
        Returns:
        Package name for this application.

      • loadAttachment

        public void loadAttachment(java.lang.String messageId,
                  DownloadStateListener listener)
        Downloads and saves the file if it is not found in file system.
        Parameters:
        messageId - Row id of the message which contains attachment.
        listener - PhotoDownloadStateListener instance which is called when download started and finished.

      • sendMyCurrentLocation

        public void sendMyCurrentLocation(Address to,
                         MessageStatusListener listener)
        Sends current location to specified destination.
        Parameters:
        to - Destination address.
        listener - MessageStatusListener instance which is called called when message status has been changed.

      • startCall

        public RtcDialog startCall(Address to,
                  boolean isVideo)
        Start a voice or video call to the specified address
        Parameters:
        to - Destination Address.
        isVideo - true if video call.

      • startPhoneCall

        public RtcDialog startPhoneCall(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Start a phone call
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - Phone number in E164 format ('+' + country code + phone number) For example, +12125551234

      • getDialogFromIntent

        public RtcDialog getDialogFromIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
        Get an active RtcDialog from Intent

      • getNotificationManager

        public com.bit6.sdk.NotificationManager getNotificationManager()
        Returns:
        Bit6 notification manager.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message m,
               MessageStatusListener listener)
        Creates outgoing message, saves it in local database and sending to the server.
        Parameters:
        m - Message instance.
        listener - MessageStatusListener instance which will be called if upload is started, finished or failed.
